explains: n. 童年，少年时代；男孩们

sentences.en: They are rivals who have known each other since boyhood.
sentences.cn: 他们是少年时代就相识的对手。

sentences.en: I spent my boyhood climbing trees on Streatham Common, South London.
sentences.cn: 我的童年是在伦敦南部的 Streatham Common 爬树度过的。

sentences.en: My boyhood hero was Kit Carson.
sentences.cn: 我孩提时的偶像是基特·卡森。
